casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

July 9, 2007

[Cite as 07/09/2007 Case Announcements, 2007-Ohio-3471.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2007-0776. State ex rel. Biehle v. Perz.

In Mandamus. This cause originated in this court on the filing of a complaint for a writ of mandamus. Upon consideration of the joint motion for stay of proceedings pending settlement,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is granted and this case is stayed pending further order of this court.

It is further ordered that the parties shall notify the court forthwith of any settlement.
